overview.description: A subscription-based app for learning Indonesian cooking techniques.
overview.problem_statement: Many individuals interested in Indonesian cuisine find a lack of accessible, authentic, and interactive resources to learn and perfect their cooking techniques.
objectives: Provide a diverse range of high-quality, step-by-step Indonesian cooking tutorials.
Incorporate interactive features such as video demonstrations and user feedback.
Support users in mastering the art of Indonesian cooking through guided lessons and personalized feedback.
overview.unique_value_proposition: Combine expert culinary knowledge with advanced technology to create an engaging and educational cooking experience tailored for home cooks of all skill levels.

decider.name: Jane Smith
responsibilities: Lead product vision and strategic direction.
Make final decisions on content and feature rollout.

accountable.name: Michael Johnson
responsibilities: Ensure project alignment with business goals.
Oversee comprehensive quality checks and resource management.
Develop the app's infrastructure and user interface.
Implement new features and address user feedback.

contributions: Craft authentic cooking content and tutorials.
Provide insights on user engagement with culinary techniques.

communication_plan: Regular training sessions for support staff on app features.

success_metrics.definition: Average length of user sessions on the app, measuring time devoted to cooking activities.
Percentage of users transitioning from a free trial to paid subscriptions.
Percentage of users completing at least one cooking tutorial successfully.

user_stories.title: Explore Cooking Techniques
user_stories.user_story: As a cooking enthusiast, I want to explore various Indonesian cooking techniques categorized by skill level.
acceptance_criteria: Techniques are organized by difficulty: Beginner, Intermediate, Expert.
Each technique includes description, tools needed, and not-yet-attainable goals.

user_stories.title: Step-by-Step Guided Recipe
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want a step-by-step guide with video and text instructions for each recipe so that I can follow along easily.
acceptance_criteria: Each step includes video demonstration alongside written instructions.
Progress markers to indicate completion of each cooking step.

user_stories.title: Feedback and Ratings System
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to provide feedback and rate tutorials based on my experience.
acceptance_criteria: Users can leave comments, ratings, and suggestions for improvement on each tutorial.
Feedback is visible to both other users and the development team for improvements.
